## SceneUIEventPayloads."SCENE\_UI.SET\_VIEW\_DISTANCE" property

Emitted when the view distance of a SceneUI is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[SceneUIEvent.SET_VIEW_DISTANCE]: {
        sceneUI: SceneUI;
        viewDistance: number;
    };
```
